item.title: Light in the Darkness - The Iranian Church’s Response to Conflict
item.description: In this bonus episode, Elam’s Executive Director, David Yeghnazar, shares how the Iranian church has been responding to the recent conflict with Israel. You will hear encouraging stories and prayer needs for Iranian Christians at this critical time. Join us in praying for Iran’s church using free prayer resources at www.elam.com/pray-for-iran and by signing up to our regular prayer updates at www.elam.com/subscribe. To access free resources that will help your Iranian friends share the hope o... Feed: https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/1948534.rss

item.title: Wedding Bell Blues
item.description:
Hey y'all! Jess and Taylor are talking about movies again, but then Jess helps someone out who wants to give his significant other the wedding of her dreams, but can't afford it ...even though they already started planning it! What should he do??

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
